backend/main.mo: Defines the main Motoko canister with client, onboarding, KYC, user, admin, and authorization data types plus initial storage and helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related frontend files, components, and test IDs for regression to Version 23 behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend files, describing their responsibilities and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining Swiss-style OKLCH design tokens and global CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with authentication and authorization gates and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Shows an access-denied card UI when a user lacks authorization.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Renders sidebar navigation, user info, and logout handling, wrapping page content with TanStack Router's Outlet.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Displays login screen and triggers Internet Identity login with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/AuthorizationGat: Checks authorization status and actor readiness, showing loading or denial screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientAc: Parses and displays client activity log entries in a sortable table with support for old and new formats.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientId: Wrapper tab combining identity documents, KYC screening history, and risk assessment sections.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientOv: Shows client contact and profile fields with optional edit mode using mock and stored data.
frontend/src/components/clients/CurrentR: Displays overall risk level, factors, and assessment dates with option to initiate new screening.
frontend/src/components/clients/Identity: Renders identity documents with verification status, expiry info, and option to add new documents.
frontend/src/components/clients/KycScree: Shows a table of past KYC screenings including risk results, PEP/sanctions checks, and notes.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/EditO: Dialog component allowing users to update a client's onboarding stage, status, assignee, and due date, submitting changes via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Displays a client's onboarding card with status, assignee, and due date, and opens an edit dialog for modifications.
Builds a six-column kanban board by normalizing onboarding pipeline data and rendering each stage with its cards.
Renders a single kanban column showing a stage title, card count, and list of client cards.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/onboa: Defines the ordered list of onboarding stages and helper functions to map between stage names and numbers.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting authenticated users without profiles to submit name and email, saving via mutation.
frontend/src/components/settings/AdminMa: Admin panel section for listing, adding, and removing admins, restricted to the operator and backed by related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for users, admins, clients, dashboard stats, and onboarding mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark CSS variables and base typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/mocks/clientDetailMock.ts: Generates deterministic mock client‑detail data including KYC, documents, risk, and alerts.
frontend/src/mocks/clientsListMock.ts: Provides a static list of mock client profiles with Swiss-style data and mock principals.
frontend/src/pages/AddClientPage.tsx: Form for creating a new client, validates input, saves via backend or local fallback.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays and edits detailed client info using backend, mock, and local data with PDF export and activity log merging.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists clients with search, sort, and navigation, merging backend, mock, and local clients.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page showing client statistics and upcoming KYC review deadlines using data from query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/KYCScreeningPage.tsx: Static page header for managing KYC screening and related checks.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Displays onboarding pipeline with loading skeletons, error state, and a Kanban board.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Simple reports page with a header describing available compliance reports.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page that renders application settings and admin management.
frontend/src/utils/clientActivityLog.ts: LocalStorage utilities for loading, appending, and clearing per‑client activity logs.
frontend/src/utils/clientOverrides.ts: LocalStorage helpers for loading, saving, and clearing client field override data.
frontend/src/utils/clientPdfExport.ts: Generates structured PDF data for a client by compiling contact, personal, mandate, wallet, and compliance fields.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting helpers for dates, IDs, status labels, risk labels, and document expiry status.
frontend/src/utils/localClients.ts: LocalStorage management for mock/local clients including ID generation, save/load, and updates.
frontend/src/utils/pdfDownload.ts: Utility to sanitize filenames and generate downloadable printable HTML-based PDFs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helper functions to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, rollback requirements, known issues, and feature restoration tasks for reverting to version 23 behavior.
